mapper.insert: insert into sys_log (log_id, user_name, operation, method, params, ip, isdel, create_time) values (#{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

log_id,

mapper.update:
update sys_log
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operation = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
